Settings

Here are the settings available for the game:

  • Click on the opton with RIGHT button of mouse to enable.
  • Click on the option with LEFT button of mouse to disable.

Show Parameters

Hidden parameters are shown on the screen to help debugging the code.

No Game Over

Extend the paddle size to the maximum to help debugging the code and also see the changes on the screen from level 1 to 12.

Pause Function

When pause function is enabled, use the middle button of the mouse to freeze the game screen as needed.

Double the paddle size

The paddle size can be increased and then ease the game while you are training and improving your skills.
